item.title: David Berman: Amidst American Water, Part II
item.description: Paula Crossfield: Before, we were talking about your process. In particular you were talking about “Smith and Jones” - looking at it as a way to describe your writing process. You described working at The Whitney, and your twenty-lines-a-day, and having ten years' worth of books.

item.title: David Berman: Amidst American Water, Part I
item.description:
Paula Crossfield: Hi, David?

David Berman: Hey Paula.

PC: Thank you so much for taking the time and for getting back to me so quickly.
